title: ATLAS - CONTROLS AFTER EOD*1 (including C6700)
time_sequence: GN - ATLAS PHASE 5.3 - PROCESSING AFTER STAR 1

task_list.instruction_title:
Execute the below controls and share results by mail:

C6700 - Estimatif Client
C6758 - Comparaison des performances 
C6755 - Estimatif Client - Comparaison des Nav Globales
C6730 - Comparaison Nav Globale et Performance 
C6099 - Assets integrated by company
C6710 - Asset ATLAS by currency 

C6006 - Liste des comptes tiers UBP AVEC correspondance ex-TORONTO qui ont bouge avant et apres l'EOD
